tools.name: read_file

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the file to read

returns.description: Content of the file or an error message

tools.name: write_file

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: File path to write content to

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Content to be written to the file

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Mode to open the file in ('w' for write, 'a' for append)

tools.name: search_web
tools.description: Perform a web search for information

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of search results to return

returns.description: List of search results with titles and snippets

tools.name: extract_data
tools.description: Extract specific data from a web search result
